Uses of Class
zipkin2.junit.ZipkinRule

    • Uses of ZipkinRule in zipkin2.junit

      Methods in zipkin2.junit that return ZipkinRule 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ZipkinRule ZipkinRule.enqueueFailure​(HttpFailure failure)
      Adds a one-time failure to the http endpoint.
      ZipkinRule ZipkinRule.storeSpans​(List<Span> spans)
      Stores the given spans directly, to setup preconditions for a test.
